meanings: Noun (특히 특별한 순서 없이) 옹기종기 모여 서 있는 것

vlive.korean: 너 혼자 그거 하면서 가 그 허들. You should huddle by yourself. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [Stray Kids : SKZ-TALKER(슼즈토커)] Ep.03
엄청난 허들이었을 거라고 생각해요. I guess such characteristics must be a high entry barrier. 듣기 View video CASPER RADIO : 하박국의 박국박국해 #4 (방탄소년단 특집)
vlive.english: I guess such characteristics must be a high entry barrier.

vlive.korean: [그전에 거쳐야 할 기상미션의 관문!] [Before that, the hurdle of morning mission!] View video ATEEZ : ATEEZ(에이티즈) WANTED 5화
vlive.english: [Before that, the hurdle of morning mission!]

vlive.korean: 일단 원은 짧게 합시다 앞으로 - 네? Let's keep the huddle short. - What? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : [몬채널][B] EP.117 MONSTA X 'SHOOT OUT' Win
vlive.english: Let's keep the huddle short. - What?

vlive.korean: 새로움 앞에서는 마음이 움츠러든다. makes my heart huddled in front of new things. 듣기 View video MOMO X : [모모문고] 김용국 편
vlive.english: makes my heart huddled in front of new things.

examples.korean: His horse fell as it jumped the last hurdle. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 말이 마지막 허들을 뛰어넘다가 넘어졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His horse fell as it jumped the last hurdle. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: jump a horse over a fence[hurdle] 듣기 Add to Wordbook 말에게 장애물[허들]을 뛰어넘게 하다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: jump a horse over a fence[hurdle] Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Schmidt must vault many hurdles to finish his race. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 슈미트는 레이스를 끝내기 위해 많은 허들을 뛰어 넘어야 한다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Schmidt must vault many hurdles to finish his race. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He cleared every hurdle. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 허들을 모두 뛰어넘었다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He cleared every hurdle. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The athlete stepped over the huddle. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 운동선수는 그 허들을 넘었다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The athlete stepped over the huddle. Add to Wordbook
